Class DistanceMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.clustering.hierarchicalclustering.DistanceMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DistanceMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements an upper trianglar distance matrix.
    Author:
    Roberto Perdisci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistanceMatrix(java.lang.String path)
      Loads the distance matrix from a file which contains the upper triangle values in a single row.
      DistanceMatrix(java.lang.String path, HierarchicalClustering.LinkageType linkMethod)
      Loads the distance matrix from a file which contains the upper triangle values in a single row.
      DistanceMatrix(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Float> vals)
      Instantiates a new distance matrix from a list of matrix values specified in row major order.
      DistanceMatrix(java.util.Vector<java.lang.Float> vals, HierarchicalClustering.LinkageType linkMethod)
      Instantiates a new distance matrix from a list of matrix values specified in row major order.

      • DistanceMatrix

        public DistanceMatrix(java.lang.String path)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the distance matrix from a file which contains the upper triangle values in a single row.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the matrix file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the matrix values file can not be read

      • DistanceMatrix

        public DistanceMatrix(java.lang.String path,
              HierarchicalClustering.LinkageType linkMethod)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the distance matrix from a file which contains the upper triangle values in a single row.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the matrix file
        linkMethod - the linkage method to use when clustering
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the matrix values file can not be read

    • Method Detail

      • getNumInstances

        public int getNumInstances()
        Gets the num instances.
        Returns:
        the num instances

      • distance

        public float distance(int i,
             int j)
        Return the value at coordinates (i,j). If i = j then 0 is returned. If j < i then the value at (j,i) is returned.
        Parameters:
        i - the row coordinate
        j - the column coordinate
        Returns:
        the value at the specified coordinates

      • distance

        public float distance(IndexPair p)
        Get the distance between the clusters at the supplied indexes.
        Parameters:
        p - the indexes of the clusters
        Returns:
        the distance between the clusters, if the row == column then 0 is returned, if the indexes are not within the bounds of the distance matrix Float.MAX_VALUE is returned

      • findClosestClusterPair

        public ClusterIndexPair findClosestClusterPair()
        Find closest cluster pair in the distance matrix.
        Returns:
        the closest cluster index pair

      • printDistMatrix

        public void printDistMatrix()
        Prints the distance matrix to stdout.
